name: Timelapse Flight | Athens to Geneva | Aegean Airlines Airbus A320
description:
A timelapse flight from Athens to Geneva, with Aegean Airlines onboard Airbus A320 SX-DVX operating flight A3820 on January 9 2017.

Full flight: https://youtu.be/rUxE9p9Ch6o

This flight filmed by Alex Tsaka - check out his awesome channel at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfYAzMOxJRy47_hgX1mUjIQ
Video without ATC: https://youtu.be/UX4ZZmDyTpM

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTSPATREON: http://patreon.com/inflightvideo
MY CAMERA GEAR: https://www.amazon.com/shop/inflightvideo
Airline:  Aegean Airlines
Flight:  A3820 (callsign 'Aegean 2 Victor Golf')
Aircraft:  Airbus A320-200 SX-DVX
From:  Athens (ATH)
To:  Geneva (GVA)
Departure:  08:44
Arrival:  10:13
Flight Time:  2:29
Seat:  7F
Flight Path:  https://goo.gl/uXUMmw
